trans-unit.source: Represents an element for associating a semantic value with a phrase in a grammar.

This object is similar to the `tag` element defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0.](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
However, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A> property of this object cannot be script.
The contents of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A> can be of the type <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int32>, or <xref:System.String>.
String values must be enclosed in double quotes.
To add semantics as script, use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> class, specifying a value for the instance.
The value used to set the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value"></xref> property.
value is `null`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> class, specifying a name and a value for the instance.

The string used to set the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name"></xref> property on the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> object.

The object used to set the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value"></xref> property on the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> object.
value is `null`.
name is `null`.
name is an empty string.
Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> instance.
A string that contains the name of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> instance.
An attempt is made to set <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name"></xref> to `null`.
An attempt is made to set <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name"></xref> to an empty string.
Gets or sets the value contained in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> instance.
The valid types for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A> property are:
The value contained in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> instance.
An attempt is made to set <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value"></xref> to `null`.
An attempt is made to set <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value"></xref> to an invalid type.
